titleStmt.title: A brief representation of the Quakers case of not-swearing and why they might have been, and yet may be, relieved therein by Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Eccleston, Theodor, 1651-1726.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated: Theodor Eccleston, London, Dec. 22, 1694.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
